semantic parsing.from sentence: In this paper , we describe a semantic parsing approach to the problem of KB QA .

Semantic parses.from sentence: Semantic parses can be deterministically converted to a query to extract the answers from the KB .

each input question.construct: explicit structural semantic parse ( semantic graph )
each input question.from sentence: That is , for each input question , we construct an explicit structural semantic parse ( semantic graph ) , as in .

Gated Graph Neural Networks ( GGNNs ).from sentence: In particular , we adapt Gated Graph Neural Networks ( GGNNs ) , described in , to process and score semantic parses .
